name: Goldhat Stats Plugin
author: Kenji Crosland

sections.description:
This is the official WordPress widget for GoldHat. By using the GoldHat widget you can display to your readers just how much GoldHat users appreciate your great content. The widget displays number of donations made to your post, the total amount of donations as well as the name of the highest donor. If your post hasn’t received any donations yet, the widget provides a way for users to quickly access the donations page for your post.

What’s GoldHat all about? Check out our Welcome Page!
sections.installation:
1. Download goldhat-widget.zip.
  2. Go to your WordPress dashboard and click “Add New” on the plugin sidebar.
  3. Click upload and choose goldhat.widget.zip
  4. Click “Install Now”
sections.faq:
My answer isn’t here! What can I do?

Please feel free to ask any question at send_inquiry [at] goldhat dot org.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Widget now displays on all posts.
  • Added Submission Functionality.

0.9

  • Still working on a couple of features. The widget can display your data from goldhat but will not show anything for posts that have not yet been submitted to goldhat.
